name: TextDrawColor
notes: If the TextDraw is already shown, it must be re-shown (TextDrawShowForAll/TextDrawShowForPlayer) for the changes of this function to take effect.
description: Sets the text color of a textdraw

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the textdraw to change the color of..

params_body.name: color
params_body.description: The color to set the textdraw to.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
